episodes.title: Investigative journalist talks NXIVM and Twin Flames Universe & how cults indoctrinate their victims
episodes.description:
Sarah Berman is an investigative journalist based in Vancouver. She covers crime, drugs, politics, and CULTS, which is the focus of our conversation today. She is a former senior editor at VICE. She wrote Don’t Call It A Cult: The Shocking Story of Kieth Raniere and the Women of NXIVM. She also appeared in Netflix’s “Escaping Twin Flames,” where she weighed in on another cult, the Twin Flames Universe, that she had also heavily researched and studied. 

She shares what sets a cult apart from any other organization, how cults are started, who they prey upon, what demographic of people typically become victims (or cult leaders, for that matter), the tactics they employ to brainwash their victims and more.

Thank you so much for watching, would love to hear your thoughts below!
